manifest_desc.message: Open a link in a pinned tab using a new tab.

opts_title_exclude.message: Open the link of the same hostname within the same tab

localdata_note.message: This extension uses the localStorage function defined since HTML5. Following table shows the all data which is stored at the localStorage database. If you want to reset the data, please push the 'Remove All' button.

opts_note.message: The following table shows default variables of the context menu.
